mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, t.annotation, t.creation_time, t.modify_time, count(atg.article_id) as article_count, u.username, u.nickname from article_tag atg join(tag t ,user_tag ut ,`user` u ) on atg.tag_id = t.id and ut.tag_id = t.id and u.id = ut.user_id group by t.id, t.name, t.annotation, t.creation_time, t.modify_time, u.username, u.nickname
